Machine Learning Dependent Projects¶

A few references that explore why machine learning dependent business projects fail, and the advantages of starting with ``the end in mind’’

  • Why Data Science Projects Fail: Practical Principles for Data Science Success, by Douglas A. Gray. This is the first article of the excellent series.
  • The AI Play Book: Mastering the Rare Art of Machine Learning Deployment, by Eric Siegel.
